pkgmetadata.longdescription: Locally Gaussian Distributions: Estimation and Methods // An implementation of locally Gaussian distributions. It provides methods for implementing the locally Gaussian density estimator (LGDE) by Otneim and Tjstheim (2017) doi:10.1007/s11222-016-9706-6, as well as the corresponding estimator for conditional density functions by Otneim and Tjstheim (2018) doi:10.1007/s11222-017-9732-z.
